Structs/RandomizedGeneratorSequence.html.name: init(_:)
Structs/RandomizedGeneratorSequence.html.abstract: Initializes a RandomizedGenerator wrapped as a Sequence which also acts as it’s own Iterator

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.name: init(_:randomSource:)
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Initializes a RandomizedGenerator wrapper, which consists of the wrapped Generator binded together with randomSource to produce values without requiring a RandomSource at every call

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.name: next()
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Produces the next element from this generator using the bound random source

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.name: map(_:)
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Returns: A randomized generator that transforms it’s wrapped generator

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.name: sequence(_:)
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Returns: A sequence of this generator’s values which will produce nil after size iterations

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.name: sequence()
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Returns: A sequence of this generator’s values which will produce infinite elements

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.name: take(_:)
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Returns: An array of values from the generator

Structs/LazyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything.name: init(_:)
Structs/LazyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything.abstract: Initializes the DeferredGenerator with a starter factory that produces a Generator when started

Structs/LazyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything.name: start()
Structs/LazyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything.abstract: Produce a generator using the wrapped factory

Structs/LazyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything.name: map(_:)
Structs/LazyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything.abstract: Returns: A generatable that transforms it’s wrapped generator. The transformations will be deferred until after the Generatable has been started allowing for transformations that can be shared safely.

Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.name: arbitrary()
Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.abstract: Generates an arbitrary value of type T where T conforms to Arbitrary

Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.name: callAsFunction()
Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.abstract: Generates an arbitrary value of type T where T conforms to Arbitrary

Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.name: arbitraryCase()
Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.abstract: Generates an arbitrary value of type T where T conforms to CaseIterable

Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.name: callAsFunction()
Structs/Composer.html#/s:9Genything8Comp.abstract: Generates an arbitrary value of type T where T conforms to CaseIterable

Structs/AnyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything1.name: init(_:)
Structs/AnyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: Creates a type-erasing Generator to wrap the provided Generator

Structs/AnyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything1.name: init(_:)
Structs/AnyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: Creates an AnyGenerator which generates elements via the provided block

Structs/AnyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything1.name: next(_:)
Structs/AnyGenerator.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: Produces the next element from this generator using the provided random source

Structs/Composer.html.name: Composer
Structs/Composer.html.abstract: The composer class which passes in the randomSource and allows us to generate more complex data with ease

Structs/LazyGenerator.html.name: LazyGenerator
Structs/LazyGenerator.html.abstract: A LazyGenerator defers the initialization of a generator until a later time. This should be used when generators have state requirements which might cause them to behave in unexpected ways when shared or recreated.

Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html.name: RandomizedGenerator
Structs/RandomizedGenerator.html.abstract: A Generator binded together with a RandomSource which has copies of Generator functions which produce values. Used to persist the randomness between multiple generated productions of values.

Structs/RandomizedGeneratorSequence.html.name: RandomizedGeneratorSequence
Structs/RandomizedGeneratorSequence.html.abstract: A RandomizedGenerator wrapped as a Sequence which also acts as it’s own Iterator

Protocols/Arbitrary.html#/s:9Genything9A.name: arbitrary
Protocols/Arbitrary.html#/s:9Genything9A.abstract: Returns a generator capable of randomly generating every possible value for the conforming type

Protocols/RandomInRangeable.html#/s:9Gen.name: random(in:using:)
Protocols/RandomInRangeable.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Returns a random value within the specified range.

Protocols/RandomInRangeable.html#/s:9Gen.name: random(in:using:)
Protocols/RandomInRangeable.html#/s:9Gen.abstract: Returns a random value within the specified range.

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: T
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: The type of element which this Generator produces

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: next(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Produces the next element from this generator using the provided random source

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: eraseToAnyGenerator()
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Erases types conforming to the abstract protocol Generator to the concrete struct AnyGenerator

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: debug(_:file:line:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Logs a print statement for each value produced by the receiver

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: expand(toSize:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: The receiver’s generator expanded to generate an array of the receiver’s values

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: expand(toSizeInRange:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: The receiver’s generator expanded to generate an array of the receiver’s values

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: expand(toSizeInRange:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: The receiver’s generator expanded to generate an array of the receiver’s values

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: flatMap(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator that transforms the receiver into a generator of type R

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: map(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator that transforms the receivers’ values into a value of type R

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: or(_:otherProbability:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator which randomly selects values from either the receiver or the other generator

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: orNil(nilProbability:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator that wraps the receivers’ values in an optional

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: recompose(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Apply additional changes to an already created element on the receiving generator

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: regenerate(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Apply additional changes to an already created element on the receiving generator

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: replaceNil(with:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator that replaces the receivers’ nil values with the replacement

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: replacingOccurrences(of:in:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator of strings which replace character in source by the content of the receiver’s generator

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: scan(_:_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator that transforms the receivers’ values by providing the current element to a closure along with the last value produced by the resulting Generator.

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: startWith(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator which iterates the elements of sequence. When exhausted the generator will switch to producing values from the receiving generator.

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: zip(_:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the receiver and other

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the receiver and other

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the receiver and other

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the receiver and other

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the receiver and other

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: zip(_:_:_:_:transform:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the receiver and other

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: sequence(_:randomSource:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A sequence of this generator’s values which will produce nil after size iterations

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: sequence(randomSource:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: A sequence of this generator’s values which will produce infinite elements

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: take(_:randomSource:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: An array of values from the generator

Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.name: randomize(with:)
Protocols/Generator.html#/s:9Genything9G.abstract: Returns: The receiver generator binded together with randomSource to produce values without requiring a RandomSource at every call

Protocols/Generator.html.name: Generator
Protocols/Generator.html.abstract: Represents a type which can be generated from. The type is passed a RandomSource and is expected to use this source for any random operations such that the generator is deterministic. By controlling how this RandomSource is shared the generator’s values can also be controlled such that they are independent if that is your desire. e.g. One generator does not affect other generators.

Protocols/RandomInRangeable.html.name: RandomInRangeable
Protocols/RandomInRangeable.html.abstract: Indicates a type which can provide random values within a Range

Protocols/Arbitrary.html.name: Arbitrary
Protocols/Arbitrary.html.abstract: A type conforming to the Arbitrary protocol can be used to generate arbitrary (random) values

Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO9Geny.name: arbitrary
Extensions/Result.html#/s:s6ResultO9Geny.abstract: A generator of Results where Success and Failure conform to Arbitrary

Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:SD9Genythi.name: arbitrary
Extensions/Dictionary.html#/s:SD9Genythi.abstract: A generator of Dictionarys where Key and Value conform to Arbitrary

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa9GenythingAA9.name: arbitrary
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa9GenythingAA9.abstract: A generator of arbitrary Arrays of random sizes

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa9GenythingAA9.name: arbitrary(in:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa9GenythingAA9.abstract: A generator of arbitrary Arrays of random sizes in range

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9GenythingE9.name: arbitrary
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9GenythingE9.abstract: A generator of arbitrary Strings of random sizes

Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9GenythingE9.name: arbitrary(in:)
Extensions/String.html#/s:SS9GenythingE9.abstract: A generator of arbitrary Strings of random sizes inrange

Extensions/ClosedRange.html#/s:SN9Genyth.name: arbitrary
Extensions/ClosedRange.html#/s:SN9Genyth.abstract: Returns: A generator which produces arbitrary elements in the receiver’s space of possibile values

Extensions/Range.html#/s:Sn9GenythingAA1.name: arbitrary
Extensions/Range.html#/s:Sn9GenythingAA1.abstract: Returns: A generator which produces arbitrary elements in the receiver’s space of possibile values

Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl9Genythi.name: arbitrary
Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl9Genythi.abstract: Returns: A generator which randomly produces values form the receiving collection

Enums/Determinism.html#/s:9Genything11De.name: random
Enums/Determinism.html#/s:9Genything11De.abstract: A random Determinism seeded by a random value

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: collect(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Collects and combines the values from the generators maintaining the order

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: collect(_:_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Collects and combines the values from the generators maintaining the order

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: compose(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Easily draw values from various generators to create a generator which will execute the compose block for each generation.

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: either(left:right:rightProbability:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator which randomly selects values from either the left or right generator

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: join(_:separator:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A new generator which produces strings by concatenating the elements of the generator collection, adding the given separator between each generated element.

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: one(of:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator which produces values randomly selected from one of the provided generators

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: reduce(_:_:_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator resulting from combining generated elements from the generators collection using the given closure

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: replacing(_:with:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator of strings which modify the source by replacing all occurence of replace strings by their associated generator

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: weighted(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator which produces values from the provided generators according to their weights

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: weighted(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator which produces values from the provided constant values according to their weights

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: constant(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A Generator that constantly produces the provided value

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: iterate(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: A Generator that generates a given Sequence of elements. When the generator exhausts the elements in the sequence, it will begin to return nil.

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: loop(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: A stateful generator which produces elements by looping over a collection of elements.

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: shuffleLoop(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: A generator which produces results by shuffling the provided list and drawing values until empty, then reshuffles

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: shuffled(_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator which produces the result of shuffling the provided list

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: zip(_:_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the supplied generators

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: zip(_:_:transform:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the supplied generators

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: zip(_:_:_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the supplied generators

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: zip(_:_:_:transform:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the supplied generators

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: zip(_:_:_:_:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the supplied generators

Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.name: zip(_:_:_:_:transform:)
Enums/Generators.html#/s:9Genything10Gen.abstract: Returns: A generator by zipping together the values produced by the supplied generators

Enums/Determinism.html.name: Determinism
Enums/Determinism.html.abstract: The Determinism affects the relative randomness of value generation

Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.name: init()
Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: Initializes a RandomSource from a predetermined shared seed

Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.name: originalSeed
Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: The original seed used to begin random number generation

Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.name: rng
Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: A type-erased random number generator conformed to RandomNumberGenerator

Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.name: random()
Classes/RandomSource.html#/s:9Genything1.abstract: Returns: An independent RandomSource initialized from a nondeterministic seed

Classes/RandomSource.html.name: RandomSource
Classes/RandomSource.html.abstract: The randomSource will be passed through all generators
